nodes.text: The Star Wars 3-Book Gift Set is a box set from Studio Fun International that collects three young-readers titles based on the film Star Wars: The Force Awakens. The collected titles include Rey's Survival Guide, Poe Dameron: Flight Log, and Star Wars: Aliens and Ships of the Galaxy. The set was released on November 22, 2016.
For Star Wars collectors and new fans alike!

This exclusive Star Wars three-book gift set contains Rey's Survival Guide, Poe Dameron: Flight Log, and Aliens and Ships of the Galaxy. Also included are two double-sided posters featuring new aliens and ships from The Force Awakens!
